Package de.chojo.sadu.queries.converter

Interface ValueConverter<T,V>

Type Parameters:
T - The Java type that is handled
V - The intermediate SQL type that is sent to the database
All Superinterfaces:
Adapter<T>, ValueReader<T,V>
public interface ValueConverter<T,V> extends Adapter<T>, ValueReader<T,V>
A value converter that serves as an AdapterMapping and ValueReader
